name: Quad Rey Rana: Tijuana Track Stars
name_original: Quad Rey Rana: Tijuana Track Stars
description:
Join Rey on his quest to prove he's the best racer around in the world's best Tijuana Mexico based racing game. This is Quad Rey Rana Tijuana Track Stars.

Control with WASD, Arrow keys or game pad. Use right trigger to accelerate, left trigger to reverse/brake, left analogue stick to steer. Use A to proceed to next level. Use B to re-spawn.

Thanks for playing.
